SELECT v.vote_no, v.vote_title, to_char(v.vote_end_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI') as vote_end_date, v.member_no, m.member_nickname FROM ( SELECT vote_no, vote_title, vote_end_date, member_no FROM vote_tbl ORDER BY vote_no DESC ) v JOIN member_tbl m ON v.member_no = m.member_no WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit}
